sector.name: Unicorn Caves
sector.string: When you walk into this huge cavern, you have to look twice to make sure your eyes aren't misleading you. So far, the caves of the Za-Khazi run have been your ordinary Exile caverns - rough, wild, filled with fungi and rubble.

This cavern, on the other hand, has been carefully cultivated. It lacks the rubble and rough ground, instead being filled with carefully arranges groves of twisted trees and tall, creamy white toadstools.
The ceiling fungi in this cavern glow brighter than normal, giving you a good view of the lovely cavescape. You aren't sure who made it like this, but it is undeniably beautiful.
As you look, you think you catch a glimpse of something white moving in a nearby copse. Then it is gone.
Among the mushrooms, you find a small patch of strange, beautiful yellow flowers. Perhaps nobody would mind if you picked a few of them.
The cave wall here is studded with small, red, glittering crystals. One of them protrudes a bit, and would be easy to break off and take with you.
